message: Take it or leave it, Bob. It's a fair deal.
I think we can do better.  Let's split it fairly.
I'm still willing to split it 999,999 to 1. This time, I'm keeping 80% of my share due to inflation, so this is the best deal you'll get.
Let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money, considering inflation.
